name: The Islands of Light TechDemo
description:
The Islands of Light was started originally as a passion project for my Gr.10 English class however once I started Gr.12 English it has become a full time project for me and the mates at Cross Eyed Development. If you have any requests or criticism feel free to post below!

Controls

V - Equip weapon

LMouse - Attack

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

(If I forgot any please let me know!)
